title: Marvellous Mug Recipes: Amazing Single Serving Meals!
description: Did you know that you can make delicious meals in a mug? And right in your microwave too. All you need is a few ingredients and a nice sturdy mug and you’re ready to go! These recipes are super easy to make and come together in no time. This book is loaded with delicious mug recipes that you just have to try. You can make an omelette as you head through the door in the mornings or a delicious warm cinnamon roll. What are you waiting on? Let’s ditch the pots and grab our mugs!
author: Daniel Humphreys
